Posts.Content: Nov 4, 2017 10:49AM turosol wrote: I had two removed 5 days ago. Pulling them out, I would say there was a burning sensation. But it was gone in two minutes or less. I would suggest taking an anti-anxiety and pain pill prior to going in. This will help relieve the anxiety and pain. One of the easiest parts of mastectomy.
Posts.Title: Drain removal....prepare me Kahnartist Momine
